Deciever's Ploy.name: Deciever's Ploy
Deciever's Ploy.fullText:
Infernal Strategist Attack 11Deciever's Ploy

You feint, then lunge, setting your foe off balance.

Encounter        Martial, Weapon
Standard Action      Melee weapon

Target: One creature

Attack: Strength vs. Will. If you are using a shield, you gain combat advantage for this attack.

Hit: 2[W] + Strength modifier damage, and the target takes a –2 penalty to attack rolls until the end of your next turn.


Published in Martial Power, page(s) 125.

Flexible Authority.name: Flexible Authority
Flexible Authority.fullText:
Infernal Strategist Utility 12Flexible Authority

You have the answer for any desperate situation.

Encounter        Healing, Martial
Immediate Reaction      Close burst 10

Trigger: One ally within 10 squares of you spends an action point to take an extra action

Target: The triggering ally in the burst

Effect: You choose for the target to gain one of the following benefits: regain hit points equal to one-half your level + your Charisma modifier; gain a bonus to the extra action’s attack rolls equal to one-half your Intelligence modifier; gain a bonus to the extra action’s damage rolls equal to one-half your level + your Intelligence modifier; or make a basic attack or take a move action as a free action but grant combat advantage to all enemies until the end of his or her next turn.


Published in Martial Power, page(s) 125.

Smite of Devil's Luck.name: Smite of Devil's Luck
Smite of Devil's Luck.fullText:
Infernal Strategist Attack 20Smite of Devil's Luck

Your intrepid attack lands, setting up the opportunity for greater daring.

Daily        Martial, Reliable, Weapon
Standard Action      Melee weapon

Target: One creature

Attack: Strength vs. AC

Hit: 4[W] + Strength modifier damage. You gain an action point, which must be spent before the end of the encounter or it is lost.


Update (4/9/2010)
Delete the last sentence in the Hit entry.

Published in Martial Power, page(s) 125.

Melee weapon

Target: One creature

Attack: Strength vs. AC

Hit: 4[W] + Strength modifier damage. You gain an action point, which must be spent before the end of the encounter or it is lost.
